0.1.name: wordpress/twi2vk
0.1.description:
This plugin takes tweets from public profile and posts to VK.com(VKontekte).

Plugin stores last 50 tweets. New tweets are checked every 10 minytes (depends on WP-Cron) and every time you visit settings page. All links appear unshorted. First link in tweet is parsed as attachement to VK Wall post. Twitter usernames will appear as a link to twitter profile.
